item.title: @elonmusk: Just a reminder, many of these people laughed and even celebrated when Charlie Kirk was murdered in ...
item.description: Just a reminder, many of these people laughed and even celebrated when Charlie Kirk was murdered in cold blood. Now they‚Äôre outraged about a girl getting shot by law enforcement after she broke the law repeatedly. She: Obstructed federal law enforcement. Ignored commands to get out of her vehicle Aggressively accelerated and hit an agent with her vehicle before she was shot. The left is NOT the party of law and order. Nor do they seem to care about right or wrong.

item.title: @elonmusk: The mayor of Minneapolis is a virtue signaling joke. He‚Äôs more focused on ICE for legally enforcing ...
item.description: The mayor of Minneapolis is a virtue signaling joke. He‚Äôs more focused on ICE for legally enforcing our immigration law than he is his own citizens breaking the law and obstructing ICE. It‚Äôs backwards. He should be telling people to stay out of ICE‚Äôs way and comply. Instead he‚Äôs attacking ICE for doing its job..

item.title: @elonmusk: The facts are there for anyone to observe. South Africa now has more anti-White laws than there were...
item.description: The facts are there for anyone to observe. South Africa now has more anti-White laws than there were anti-Black laws under Apartheid! I am extremely opposed to anti-Black laws, but equally opposed to the laws against White people or other races too. There should be a fair and even playing field.

item.title: @elonmusk: Starlink is not allowed to have an Internet provider license in South Africa for the sole reason tha...
item.description: Starlink is not allowed to have an Internet provider license in South Africa for the sole reason that I am not Black. This is not ok.
